################################
######  技術交換用イベント #######
################################
namespace = ngm_tech_trade
# 研究取引 贈与 国選び
country_event = {
	id = ngm_tech_trade.8
	title = ngm_tech_trade.8.name
	desc = ngm_tech_trade.8.desc
	picture = GFX_evt_intelligence_report
	show_sound = event_activating_unknown_technology
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		set_global_flag = ngm_technology_trade_now_global_flag
		save_global_event_target_as = ngm_technology_trade_0
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				has_communications = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_0
				is_country_type = default
			}
			save_global_event_target_as = ngm_technology_trade_1
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					has_communications = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_0
					is_country_type = default
					NOT = {
						is_same_value = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_1
					}
				}
				save_global_event_target_as = ngm_technology_trade_2
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						has_communications = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_0
						is_country_type = default
						NOT = {
							is_same_value = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_1
						}
						NOT = {
							is_same_value = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_2
						}
					}
					save_global_event_target_as = ngm_technology_trade_3
					random_country = {
						limit = {
							has_communications = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_0
							is_country_type = default
							NOT = {
								is_same_value = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_1
							}
							NOT = {
								is_same_value = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_2
							}
							NOT = {
								is_same_value = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_3
							}
						}
						save_global_event_target_as = ngm_technology_trade_4

									is_same_value = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_3
								}
								NOT = {
									is_same_value = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_4
								}
							}
							save_global_event_target_as = ngm_technology_trade_5

									NOT = {
										is_same_value = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_5
									}
								}
								save_global_event_target_as = ngm_technology_trade_6
								random_country = {
									limit = {
										has_communications = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_0
										is_country_type = default
										NOT = {

								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.8.a
		trigger = {
			exists = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_1
		}
		allow = {
			NOR = {
				is_rival = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_1
				is_at_war_with = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_1
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ngm_tech_trade.9
			}
			set_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_1_country_flag
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.8.b
		trigger = {
			exists = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_2
		}
		allow = {
			NOR = {
				is_rival = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_2
				is_at_war_with = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_2
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ngm_tech_trade.9
			}
			set_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_2_country_flag
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.8.c
		trigger = {
			exists = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_3

# 研究取引 贈与 分野振り分け
country_event = {
	id = ngm_tech_trade.9
	title = ngm_tech_trade.9.name
	desc = ngm_tech_trade.9.desc
	picture = GFX_evt_intelligence_report
	show_sound = event_activating_unknown_technology
	is_triggered_only = yes
	# 物理学tier1
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.9.a
		trigger = {
			can_research_tier = {
				area = physics
				tier = 1
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ngm_tech_trade.10
			}
		}
	}
	# 物理学tier2
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.9.b
		trigger = {
			can_research_tier = {
				area = physics
				tier = 2
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ngm_tech_trade.11
			}
		}
	}
	# 物理学tier3
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.9.c
		trigger = {
			can_research_tier = {
				area = physics
				tier = 3
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ngm_tech_trade.12
			}
		}
	}
	# 物理学tier4
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.9.d
		trigger = {
			can_research_tier = {
				area = physics
				tier = 4
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ngm_tech_trade.13
			}
		}
	}
	# 物理学tier5

			can_research_tier = {
				area = physics
				tier = 5
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ngm_tech_trade.14
			}
		}
	}
	# 社会学tier1
	option = {

		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ngm_tech_trade.15
			}
		}
	}
	# 社会学tier2

				id = ngm_tech_trade.16
			}
		}
	}

	}

			country_event = {
				id = ngm_tech_trade.18
			}
		}
	}
	# 社会学tier5

			country_event = {
				id = ngm_tech_trade.19
			}
		}
	}
	# 工学tier1
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.9.k
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ngm_tech_trade.20
			}
		}
	}
	# 工学tier2
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.9.l
		hidden_effect = {

				id = ngm_tech_trade.21
			}
		}

	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.8.n
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_global_flag = ngm_technology_trade_now_global_flag
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_0
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_1
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_2
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_3
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_4
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_5
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_6
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_7
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_8
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_9
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_10
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_11
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_12
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_13
		}
	}

# 研究取引 贈与 物理学tier1
country_event = {
	id = ngm_tech_trade.10
	title = ngm_tech_trade.10.name
	desc = ngm_tech_trade.10.desc
	picture = GFX_evt_intelligence_report
	show_sound = event_activating_unknown_technology
	is_triggered_only = yes
	# ゼロG研究施設
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.10.a
		trigger = {
			has_technology = tech_space_science_1
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_global_flag = ngm_technology_trade_tech_space_science_1_global_flag
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_1_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_1
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.25
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_2_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_2
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.25
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_3_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_3
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.25
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {

				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_4

	# エキゾチック物質研究所
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.10.j
		trigger = {
			has_technology = tech_basic_science_lab_2
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_global_flag = ngm_technology_trade_tech_basic_science_lab_2_global_flag
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_1_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_1
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.25
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_2_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_2
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.25
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_3_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_3
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.25
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_4_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_4
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.25
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_5_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_5
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.25
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_6_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_6
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.25
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_7_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_7
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.25
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_8_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_8
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.25
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_9_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_9
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.25
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_10_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_10
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.25
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_11_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_11
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.25
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_12_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_12
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.25
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_13_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_13
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.25
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	# 小型封じ込めフィールド
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.10.k
		trigger = {
			has_technology = tech_space_science_2
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_global_flag = ngm_technology_trade_tech_space_science_2_global_flag
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_1_country_flag

	# 人工知能制御のコロニー船
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.10.l
		trigger = {
			has_technology = tech_cryostasis_1
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_global_flag = ngm_technology_trade_tech_cryostasis_1_global_flag
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_1_country_flag

						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_1

	# 戦闘特化コンピュータ
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.10.m
		trigger = {
			has_technology = tech_combat_computers_1
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_global_flag = ngm_technology_trade_tech_combat_computers_1_global_flag
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_1_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_1
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.25
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_2_country_flag

					limit = {

	# 火器管制補助システム
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.10.n
		trigger = {
			has_technology = tech_auxiliary_fire_control
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_global_flag = ngm_technology_trade_tech_auxiliary_fire_control_global_flag
			if = {

					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_1_country_flag

				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_1

				}
			}
			else_if = {

		name = ngm_tech_trade.8.n
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_global_flag = ngm_technology_trade_now_global_flag

			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_8
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_9
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_10
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_11
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_12
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_13
		}

# 研究取引 贈与 物理学tier2
country_event = {
	id = ngm_tech_trade.11
	title = ngm_tech_trade.11.name
	desc = ngm_tech_trade.11.desc
	picture = GFX_evt_intelligence_report
	show_sound = event_activating_unknown_technology
	is_triggered_only = yes
	# 虚空光線砲
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.11.a
		trigger = {
			has_technology = null_void_beam
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_global_flag = ngm_technology_trade_null_void_beam_global_flag
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_1_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_1
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.25
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_2_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_2
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.25
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_3_country_flag
				}

				}

					limit = {

	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.8.n
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_global_flag = ngm_technology_trade_now_global_flag
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_0
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_1
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_2
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_3
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_4
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_5
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_6
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_7
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_8
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_9
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_10
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_11
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_12
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_13
		}
	}

# 研究取引 贈与 物理学tier3
country_event = {
	id = ngm_tech_trade.12
	title = ngm_tech_trade.12.name
	desc = ngm_tech_trade.12.desc
	picture = GFX_evt_intelligence_report
	show_sound = event_activating_unknown_technology
	is_triggered_only = yes
	# エントロピーの再帰
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.12.a
		trigger = {
			has_technology = tech_akx_worm_1
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_global_flag = ngm_technology_trade_tech_akx_worm_1_global_flag
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_1_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_1
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.25
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_2_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_2
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.25
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_3_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {

			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_5_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_5
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.25
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_6_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_value = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_6
					}
					country_event = {

					}
				}

			else_if = {

						is_same_value = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_7

					country_event = {

				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_value = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_8
					}
					country_event = {

	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.12.g
		trigger = {
			has_technology = tech_sensors_3
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_global_flag = ngm_technology_trade_tech_sensors_3_global_flag
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_1_country_flag
				}

				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_5_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_value = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_5
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.25
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_6_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_value = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_6
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.25
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_7_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_value = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_7
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.25
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_8_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_value = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_8
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.25
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_9_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_value = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_9
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.25
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_10_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_value = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_10
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.25
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_11_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_value = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_11
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.25
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_12_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_value = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_12
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.25
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_13_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_value = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_13
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.25
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	# 閉じる
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.8.n
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_global_flag = ngm_technology_trade_now_global_flag
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_0
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_1
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_2
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_3
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_4
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_5
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_6
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_7
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_8
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_9
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_10
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_11
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_12
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_13
		}
	}
}

# 研究取引 贈与 物理学tier4
country_event = {
	id = ngm_tech_trade.13
	title = ngm_tech_trade.13.name
	desc = ngm_tech_trade.13.desc
	picture = GFX_evt_intelligence_report
	show_sound = event_activating_unknown_technology
	is_triggered_only = yes
	# 大量消費予測
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.13.a
		trigger = {
			has_technology = tech_consumer_good_refinement_2
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_global_flag = ngm_technology_trade_tech_consumer_good_refinement_2_global_flag
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_1_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_1
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.25
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_2_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_2
					}

	# ハイパーシールド
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.13.s
		trigger = {
			has_technology = tech_shields_5
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_global_flag = ngm_technology_trade_tech_shields_5_global_flag
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_1_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_value = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_1
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.25
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_2_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_value = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_2
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.25
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {

	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.8.n
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_global_flag = ngm_technology_trade_now_global_flag
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_0
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_1
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_2
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_3
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_4
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_5
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_6
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_7
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_8
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_9
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_10
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_11
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_12
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_13
		}
	}
}

# 研究取引 贈与 物理学tier5
country_event = {
	id = ngm_tech_trade.14
	title = ngm_tech_trade.14.name
	desc = ngm_tech_trade.14.desc
	picture = GFX_evt_intelligence_report
	show_sound = event_activating_unknown_technology
	is_triggered_only = yes
	# ジャンプドライブ
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.14.a
		trigger = {
			has_technology = tech_jump_drive_1
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_global_flag = ngm_technology_trade_tech_jump_drive_1_global_flag
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_1_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_1
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.25
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_2_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_2
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.25
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_3_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_3
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.25
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_4_country_flag

				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_4

				}
			}
			else_if = {

				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {

			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_7_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {

		name = ngm_tech_trade.14.k
		trigger = {
			has_technology = tech_enigmatic_encoder
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_global_flag = ngm_technology_trade_tech_enigmatic_encoder_global_flag
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_1_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_value = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_1
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.25
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_2_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_value = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_2
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.25
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_3_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_value = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_3
					}
					country_event = {

				}
			}
			else_if = {

	# 閉じる
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.8.n
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_global_flag = ngm_technology_trade_now_global_flag
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_0
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_1
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_2
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_3
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_4
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_5
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_6
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_7
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_8
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_9
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_10
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_11
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_12
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_13
		}
	}
}

########society
country_event = {
	id = ngm_tech_trade.15
	title = ngm_tech_trade.15.name
	desc = ngm_tech_trade.15.desc
	picture = GFX_evt_intelligence_report
	show_sound = event_activating_unknown_technology
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.15.a
		trigger = {
			has_technology = tech_gargantuan_evolution
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_global_flag = ngm_technology_trade_tech_gargantuan_evolution_global_flag
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_1_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_value = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_1
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.25
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_2_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_value = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_2
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.25
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_3_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_value = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_3
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.25
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_4_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_value = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_4
					}
					country_event = {

					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_5_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_value = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_5
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.25
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_6_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_value = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_6
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.25
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {

				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_10_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_value = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_10
					}
					country_event = {

					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {

				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_value = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_11
					}
					country_event = {

					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.25
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.8.n
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_global_flag = ngm_technology_trade_now_global_flag
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_0
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_1
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_2
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_3
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_4
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_5
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_6
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_7
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_8
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_9

			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_13
		}
	}

			has_technology = tech_gene_tailoring
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_global_flag = ngm_technology_trade_tech_gene_tailoring_global_flag
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_1_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_value = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_1
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.25
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_2_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_value = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_2
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.25

		name = ngm_tech_trade.18.a

			has_technology = tech_society_3

		name = ngm_tech_trade.19.a

		}

country_event = {
	id = ngm_tech_trade.20
	title = ngm_tech_trade.20.name
	desc = ngm_tech_trade.20.desc
	picture = GFX_evt_intelligence_report
	show_sound = event_activating_unknown_technology
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.20.a
		trigger = {
			has_technology = tech_corvette_build_speed
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_global_flag = ngm_technology_trade_tech_corvette_build_speed_global_flag
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_1_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_value = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_1
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.25
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {

				}

country_event = {
	id = ngm_tech_trade.23
	title = ngm_tech_trade.23.name
	desc = ngm_tech_trade.23.desc
	picture = GFX_evt_intelligence_report
	show_sound = event_activating_unknown_technology
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.23.a
		trigger = {
			has_technology = tech_battleships
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_global_flag = ngm_technology_trade_tech_battleships_global_flag
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_1_country_flag
				}

					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.25
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_5_country_flag

					limit = {

# 研究取引 贈与 受け取り側
country_event = {
	id = ngm_tech_trade.25
	title = ngm_tech_trade.25.name
	desc = ngm_tech_trade.25.desc
	picture = GFX_evt_intelligence_report
	show_sound = event_activating_unknown_technology
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.25.c
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = ngm_technology_trade_tech_basic_science_lab_2_1_global_flag
		}
		allow = {
			NOT = {
				has_technology = tech_basic_science_lab_2
			}
			resource_stockpile_compare = {
				resource = influence
				value >= 50
			}
		}
		add_resource = {
			influence = -50
		}
		give_technology = {
			tech = tech_basic_science_lab_2
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_global_flag = ngm_technology_tradetech_basic_science_lab_2_global_flag
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_0
				}
				country_event = {
					id = ngm_tech_trade.26
				}
			}
			add_trust = {
				who = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_0
				amount = 50
			}
		}
	}
	option = {

				}

			has_global_flag = ngm_technology_trade_tech_self_assembling_components_1_global_flag
		}
		allow = {
			NOT = {
				has_technology = tech_self_assembling_components
			}
			resource_stockpile_compare = {
				resource = influence
				value >= 50
			}
		}
		add_resource = {
			influence = -50
		}
		give_technology = {
			tech = tech_self_assembling_components
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_global_flag = ngm_technology_tradetech_self_assembling_components_global_flag
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_0
				}
				country_event = {
					id = ngm_tech_trade.26
				}
			}
			add_trust = {
				who = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_0
				amount = 50
			}
		}

				}

		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = ngm_technology_trade_tech_gargantuan_evolution_1_global_flag
		}
		allow = {
			NOT = {
				has_technology = tech_gargantuan_evolution
			}
			resource_stockpile_compare = {
				resource = influence
				value >= 50
			}
		}
		add_resource = {
			influence = -50
		}
		give_technology = {
			tech = tech_gargantuan_evolution
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_global_flag = ngm_technology_tradetech_gargantuan_evolution_global_flag
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_0
				}
				country_event = {
					id = ngm_tech_trade.26
				}
			}
			add_trust = {
				who = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_0
				amount = 50
			}
		}
	}

				}

# 研究取引 贈与 受理
country_event = {
	id = ngm_tech_trade.26
	title = ngm_tech_trade.26.name
	desc = ngm_tech_trade.26.desc
	picture = GFX_evt_intelligence_report
	show_sound = event_activating_unknown_technology
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.26.a
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_1_country_flag
				}
				remove_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_1_country_flag
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_2_country_flag
				}
				remove_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_2_country_flag
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_3_country_flag
				}
				remove_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_3_country_flag
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_4_country_flag
				}
				remove_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_4_country_flag

# 研究取引 贈与 拒否
country_event = {
	id = ngm_tech_trade.27
	title = ngm_tech_trade.27.name
	desc = ngm_tech_trade.27.desc
	picture = GFX_evt_intelligence_report
	show_sound = event_activating_unknown_technology
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.27.a
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_1_country_flag
				}
				remove_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_1_country_flag
			}
			if = {

				}

			}
			remove_global_flag = ngm_technology_trade_now_global_flag
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_0
